name: Babalon's Hangover 2
description:
The contents of Babalon's Hangover 2 is 18+. Do not read if you are easily offended.

Thanks to everyone who contributed, could not have done this without the help of the awesome Mörk Borg Community.

A bestiary brimmed with 105 pages, 42+ Occult monsters, including Esoteric scriptures to die for, and Hopeless dungeons to die even more for. It is birthed by our Dark Queen Babalon, the mother of abominations, for use in Mörk Borg.

By using this product in your game, you will partake in giving her great nourishment throughout your escapades, allowing her to return from the Black Monolith once more.

Hope you hate it as much as we do.

The PDFs are free, but all donations from 28.05.22 - 01.07.22 (Mai 28th - 01th of July, 2022)  will go to "The Norwegian Society for Protection of Animals"

https://www.dyrebeskyttelsen.no/stott-oss/

Side note: Can contain some typos, we'd be happy if you let us know.

Legal

Babalon’s Hangover is an independent production by Stein Hansen & Liva Jensen and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License.

MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmästare Games and Stockholm Kartell.
